channel.title: Comments on: So I’m wanting to pre-order for PS4 when I get home tonight but the mobile App Store only shows a PS5 version? Are you able to get it digitally for PS4? I’m really confused.

item.title: By: Phantom3790
item.dc:creator: Phantom3790
item.description: Most likely not. Not all PS5 games are gonna drop for PS4. I was most disappointed that I have to wait to play OddWorld until I get a PS5. Best believe I grabbed up the free version when they dropped it for PS Plus
item.content:encoded: Most likely not. Not all PS5 games are gonna drop for PS4. I was most disappointed that I have to wait to play OddWorld until I get a PS5. Best believe I grabbed up the free version when they dropped it for PS Plus

item.title: By: Prepared_Potato
item.dc:creator: Prepared_Potato
item.description:
When I look at it on the app it shows up as fatal frame maiden of water, and it says it’s both but it doesn’t let me pick a PS4 version
Edit: it comes with both but it’s labeled as a ps5 game
item.content:encoded:
When I look at it on the app it shows up as fatal frame maiden of water, and it says it’s both but it doesn’t let me pick a PS4 version

Edit: it comes with both but it’s labeled as a ps5 game

item.title: By: SquishyShorts
item.dc:creator: SquishyShorts
item.description: I'm still waiting to preorder Nick All Star Brawl on ps4 and it still isn't an available option -- it comes out tomorrow.
item.content:encoded: I’m still waiting to preorder Nick All Star Brawl on ps4 and it still isn’t an available option — it comes out tomorrow.

item.title: By: Gaby_piro
item.dc:creator: Gaby_piro
item.description: Will comes Fatal Frame with Japaneses Voices ?
item.content:encoded: Will comes Fatal Frame with Japaneses Voices ?
